message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. How about a starting price of $9,500?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we split the difference and settle on $9,250?
I appreciate the compromise, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some more. How about we try $8,800?
Bob, I'm seeing your price point, but I do have a bottom line. Would you consider $9,000? This is my final offer.
I understand you're firm on your price, Alice, but I'm not willing to go above $8,800. How about we meet in the middle at $8,900?
